description: Keep hungry tummies happy with bread empanadas filled with a tasty bean mixture. They pair perfectly with spinach pesto.Â Plus, they're a nutritionally approved meal that the kids will love.
name: Healthier Bread Empanadas With Spinach Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g can no-added-salt four bean mix, rinsed, drained
5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over high heat. Add onion and cook for 2 minutes or until slightly softened. Add mince, cook, stirring to break up lumps, for 5 minutes or until browned. Add beans, corn, tomato, cumin and paprika. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 8 minutes or until liquid reduces. Cool.

Using a round 11cm cookie cutter, cut rounds from bread (process crusts to make breadcrumbs for another use). Using a rolling pin, flatten each bread circle slightly. Place 2 tbs of bean mixture on one half of each round. Fold to enclose filling. Press edges with a fork dipped in water to seal. Place on trays. Spray with oil. Repeat to make 16 in total. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden.
To make the spinach pesto, process pesto, spinach and water in a small food processor until combined. Serve empanadas with spinach pesto.
